Package client.GUI

Class GUI

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI.GUI
public class GUI
extends javafx.application.Application
This class represents the executable for the game's Graphical User Interface on the client machine

    • changeScene

      public void changeScene​(SceneName newSceneName)
      This method changes the scene displayed by the game window. It is supposed to be called from the scenes controllers
      Parameters:
      newSceneName - represents the name of the scene to be shown
